text:
Two persons, including a woman, were murdered in separate incidents in the district on Monday.

Police said G. Saraswathi (32) of Pattathur under Alwarkurichi police station was found murdered in the field near the village on Monday evening. The motive behind the murder is yet to be ascertained.

In the second incident, unidentified persons waylaid and hacked to death V. Naalayiramuthu (40) of Mannarkovil under Ambasamudram police station limits when he was riding his bicycle on Monday evening. The murderers are yet to be identified.
title: Two murdered in separate incidents
